mapper.sql: ID, ORDERID, USRID, DOCID, CONSULTINGSTATE, CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME, CONSULTATIONBOOKINGTIME, CONSULTINGHOURS, CONSULTATIONSUMMARY, STATE, CREATEDATE, CREATENAME, UPDATEDATE, UPDATENAME
mapper.select: select count(*) from HEALTHCONSULTATION where orderid=#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT Decode(dw, 0, '星期天', 1, '星期一', 2, '星期二', 3, '星期三', 4, '星期四', 5, '星期五', 6, '星期六') WEEK_DAY, orm.HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME, ime.INTERVALDATE FROM (SELECT 7 - To_number(Next_day(To_date(HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 1) - To_date(HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))dw, docid, id, HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME FROM HealthyDoctorform where STATE='1' ) orm, (select * from HealthyIntervalTime where state='1' ) ime WHERE orm.id = ime.doctorformid AND orm.docid = #{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND To_date(HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY orm.HEALTHYTYPESETTINGTIME ASC

select doc.id as docid,doc.name as docname,doc.photoId as photoId,chart.titleName as doctitle,price.GraphicPrice,price.SpeechPrice,price.VideoPrice from HEALTHDOCTOR doc,healthPrice price,healthTitleChart chart where doc.id=price.docid and doc.titlecode=chart.titlecode and doc.id=#{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select case when length(idcard) = 18 then ceil((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') - to_char(to_date(substr(idcard, 7, 8), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd')) / 10000) when length(idcard) = 15 then ceil((to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') - to_char(to_date('19' || substr(idcard, 7, 6), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd')) / 10000) end as age, case when length(idcard) = 18 then decode(mod(to_number(substr(idcard, 17, 1)), 2), 0,'2','1') when length(idcard) = 15 then decode(mod(to_number(idcard), 2), 0, '2', '1') end as sex, case when length(idcard)=18 then to_char(to_date(substr(idcard, 7, 8), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') when length(idcard)= 15 then to_char(to_date(substr(idcard, 7,6), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') end as birthday,id as mobile,name,guid
from usr where guid=#{usrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into HEALTHCONSULTATION (ID, ORDERID, USRID, DOCID, CONSULTINGSTATE, CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME, CONSULTATIONBOOKINGTIME, CONSULTINGHOURS, CONSULTATIONSUMMARY, STATE, CREATEDATE, CREATENAME, UPDATEDATE, UPDATENAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{usrid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{docid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{consultingstate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{consultationstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consultationbookingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consultinghours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consultationsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into HEALTHCONSULTATION
ID,
ORDERID,
USRID,
DOCID,
CONSULTINGSTATE,
CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME,
CONSULTATIONBOOKINGTIME,
CONSULTINGHOURS,
CONSULTATIONSUMMARY,
STATE,
CREATEDATE,
CREATENAME,
UPDATEDATE,
UPDATENAME,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{usrid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{docid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{consultingstate,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{consultationstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{consultationbookingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{consultinghours,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{consultationsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update HEALTHCONSULTATION
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR},
USRID = #{usrid,jdbcType=CHAR},
DOCID = #{docid,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONSULTINGSTATE = #{consultingstate,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME = #{consultationstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONSULTATIONBOOKINGTIME = #{consultationbookingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONSULTINGHOURS = #{consultinghours,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSULTATIONSUMMARY = #{consultationsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATENAME = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update HEALTHCONSULTATION set ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=CHAR}, USRID = #{usrid,jdbcType=CHAR}, DOCID = #{docid,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONSULTINGSTATE = #{consultingstate,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME = #{consultationstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONSULTATIONBOOKINGTIME = #{consultationbookingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONSULTINGHOURS = #{consultinghours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSULTATIONSUMMARY = #{consultationsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATENAME = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select a.usrid,a.id,a.CREATEDATE, a.CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME,a.CONSULTINGHOURS,a.CONSULTATIONSUMMARY,a.ORDERID,b.name usrname from HEALTHCONSULTATION a,usr b where b.guid=a.usrid and a.id=#{0}

select temp.id, temp.messagename, temp.pushtime, temp.usrid, temp.consultationmethod, temp.usrname, temp.consultationid, temp.orderid, temp.CREATEDATE, temp.pushmessage, temp.notreadNum, temp.reservationperiod, temp.imgguid from ( select a.id,a.messagename,a.messagetype,to_char(a.pushtime,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') pushtime,a.pushmessage,b.usrid,b.reservationperiod,b.consultationmethod,us.imgguid,us.name as usrname,consultaion.id as consultationid,to_char(a.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as createdate, a.orderid as orderid,t.notreadNum, row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY a.orderid ORDER BY a.CREATEDATE desc) as row_flg from PUSHMESSAGE a,HealthyOrder b,HealthConsultation consultaion,usr us, (select orderid,count(*) as notreadNum from PUSHMESSAGE p where p.STATE='1'and p.isread='0' and p.MESSAGETYPE='2' and p.userid= #{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by p.orderid) t where a.orderid = b.id(+) AND a.orderid = t.orderid(+) AND us.guid(+) = b.usrid AND a.orderid = consultaion.orderid(+) AND a.MESSAGETYPE ='2' and a.state=1 and a.userid= #{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) temp where temp.row_flg = '1' order by CREATEDATE desc

select to_char(ConsultationStartTime,'YYYY-MM-DD') as consultationdate ,count(1) consultationnum from HealthConsultation where ConsultingState='2' and state='1' and ConsultationStartTime between to_date( #{strdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date( #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd') group by to_char(ConsultationStartTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by to_char(ConsultationStartTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') asc
select a.id,a.SENDSTATUS, b.id phone from HealthConsultation a , usr b where a.usrid=b.guid and a.id=#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.state='1'
mapper.update: update HEALTHCONSULTATION set SENDSTATUS='1' , UPDATEDATE=sysdate , UPDATENAME='管理员' where id=#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(c.CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CONSULTATIONSTARTTIME, c.consultinghours, c.consultingstate,u.imgguid,c.id consultationid, u.guid usrid, u.name usrname, o.reservationdate || ' ' || o.reserstarttime || '-' || o.reserendtime as reservationdate, o.RESERVATIONDATE||' '||o.ReserStartTime||'-'||o.ReserEndTime as RESERVATIONPERIOD, o.RESERVATIONDATE||' '||o.ReserEndTime as ReserEndTime, o.CONSULTATIONMETHOD, o.CONSULTINGDESCRIPTION, f.ftpurl, o.RESERVATIONPHOTOID, c.CONSULTATIONSUMMARY from healthconsultation c, healthyorder o, usr u, healthftppath f where c.orderid = o.id and f.pathcode = o.pathcode and o.usrid = u.guid and o.id =#{orderid}
mapper.update: update PUSHMESSAGE set ISREAD='1' where orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and userid = #{docid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ISREAD='0'
mapper.select: select ORDERSTATE,reservationdate || ' ' || reserstarttime as startime,reservationdate || ' ' || reserendtime as endtime from HealthyOrder where ordercode= #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from HEALTHYORDER where RESERVATIONDATE = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and USRID=#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and TO_DATE(RESERSTARTTIME, 'hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'hh24:mi:ss') and TO_DATE(RESERENDTIME, 'hh24:mi:ss') <= to_date(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'hh24:mi:ss')
